entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who had previously stated that Snape was their spy. He stands up at the staff table and addresses the students.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who had been a spy for Dumbledore and had turned against Voldemort. Harry wonders if he has made contact with the Death Eaters again.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is thinking about Snape's actions and motivations.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the main antagonist who had been defeated by Dumbledore and his allies.

entities.name: hufflepuff table
entities.description: The Hufflepuff table is mentioned as a group of students who are subdued and sad.

relationships.description: Dumbledore had stated that Snape was their spy.
Harry is thinking about Snape's actions and motivations.
